# Specify required melting temp

# Specify if the sequences should be shuffled (False to maintain order in file, True to shuffle)

# Specify reagent concentrations (in M)
NA: 0.05
K: 0
TRIS: 0
MG: 0.002
DNTP: 1e-7

# Specify the sequences

>glpD>glpK
